mapper.insert:
select seq_rooms_no.nextval from dual
insert into rooms values(#{no},#{pensionNo},#{roomName},#{standardPeople},#{maxPeople},#{roomAmenities},#{addInfo},#{reserveAvai})

select seq_prices_no.nextval from dual
insert into prices values(#{no},#{roomNo},#{sortation},#{divide},#{price})
mapper.select: select r.no no ,r.room_name roomName ,r.standard_people standardPeople ,r.max_people maxPeople ,r.room_amenities roomAmenities ,r.add_info addInfo ,r.reserve_avai reserveAvai ,c.user_no userNo from rooms r, pension p , company c where c.no = p.company_no and p.no = r.pension_no and c.user_no = #{userNo} and r.no = #{no}
select r.no ,r.room_name roomName from rooms r,pension p , company c where c.no = p.company_no and p.no = r.pension_no and c.user_no = #{userNo}
select no ,save_name saveName ,image_path imgPath from room_image where rooms_no is null
select no ,save_name saveName ,image_path imgPath from room_image where rooms_no = #{roomNo}
select no ,room_no ,sortation ,price from prices where room_no = #{roomNo}

select w.no NO ,w.name WEEKNAME ,w.price_no PRICE_NO ,p.price PRICE ,p.sortation SORTATION ,p.divide DIVIDE from week w , prices p where p.no = w.price_no and p.room_no = #{roomNo} and p.sortation = 3 and p.divide = 1

select w.no NO ,w.name WEEKNAME ,w.price_no PRICE_NO ,p.price PRICE ,p.sortation SORTATION ,p.divide DIVIDE from week w , prices p where p.no = w.price_no and p.room_no = #{roomNo} and p.sortation = 3 and p.divide = 2

select w.no NO ,w.name WEEKNAME ,w.price_no PRICE_NO ,p.price PRICE ,p.sortation SORTATION ,p.divide DIVIDE from week w , prices p where p.no = w.price_no and p.room_no = #{roomNo} and p.sortation = 2 and p.divide = 1

select w.no NO ,w.name WEEKNAME ,w.price_no PRICE_NO ,p.price PRICE ,p.sortation SORTATION ,p.divide DIVIDE from week w , prices p where p.no = w.price_no and p.room_no = #{roomNo} and p.sortation = 2 and p.divide = 2

select w.no NO ,w.name WEEKNAME ,w.price_no PRICE_NO ,p.price PRICE ,p.sortation SORTATION ,p.divide DIVIDE from week w , prices p where p.no = w.price_no and p.room_no = #{roomNo} and p.sortation = 1 and p.divide = 1
